name: Rubble Rush - Jam-Packed Edition
detailed_description:
JAM-PACKED EDITION


Help support our development of other games and more jam-packed games in the future. Get access to all of Rubble Rush's assets and make something beautiful! When you buy the Jam-packed edition, you will receive 55 high-quality game assets free to use in any commercial or personal use! A lot of unused tiles, not featured in the game.

Asset list


- 6 Player animations (jump, land, mine, run, stun, throw)
- 24 Cave tiles (ores, rocks, treasure, bomb, details, powerup, background)
- 8 Effect animations (block break, break overlay, explosion, wind poofs, Score effects)
- 15 Sound effects and music (score, jump, menu, hit, toss, mine, music, win jingle)
- 1 Bat enemy
- 1 Treasure chest animation
